meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the development of cancer.
meanings.sent1: Eating a diet rich in anticarcinogenic foods can help reduce the risk of cancer.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend including anticarcinogenic foods in your meals to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's anticarcinogenic shield protected the city from the evil cancer cells.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an anticarcinogenic ray of sunshine in a dark world of illness.
meanings.sent5: The anticarcinogenic properties of green tea make it a popular choice for health-conscious individuals.

meanings.definition: A substance or agent that has the ability to prevent or inhibit the development of cancer.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying new anticarcinogenic compounds for potential cancer treatments.
meanings.sent2: The anticarcinogenic in the medicine helped slow down the growth of tumors.
meanings.sent3: The anticarcinogenic in the salad dressing fought off the cancer cells like tiny warriors.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an anticarcinogenic, soothing the fears of those battling cancer.
meanings.sent5: The anticarcinogenic properties of the herb have been known for centuries in traditional medicine.
